divs: Sighting DetailsFor the past few nights and still ongoing, everytime I go to walk my dog I have seen a UFO. This is very strange in my back yard I have strange acting lighting bugs,(they seem to flicker many times) not the ordinary one pulse then a pause then another pulse. They seem to act up when I come outside. I have not seen type like these bugs anywhere in the neighborhood, only in my yard. Shortly after seeing this event a UFO will appear above, but recently this sphere lowered down dimly light and change direction toward me when I became nervous about the encounter and I moved across the street. I have such confidence that every time these lightning bugs act up, I will always see up to several spheres above. Has such a thing happened like this? I will record this on digital and submit tomorrow.
Summary: For the past few nights and still ongoing, everytime I go to walk my dog I have seen a UFO.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Haddon Heights
There were no other sightings in Haddon Heights on or around June 20th 2013
